behaviors.decorate: function(config, response) { const path = require('path'); const safeStringify = (obj) => { const seen = new WeakSet(); return JSON.stringify(obj, (key, value) => { if (typeof value === 'object' && value !== null) { if (seen.has(value)) return; seen.add(value); } return value; }); }; response.body = safeStringify(require(path.join(__dirname, 'wireresponselogic.js'))); }
